burnFrom(address,uint256,uint256).details: Credits are burned first, then tokens are burned.Only a project's current controller can burn its tokens.

params.amount: The amount of tokens to burn.
params.holder: The address that owns the tokens which are being burned.
params.projectId: The ID of the project to the burned tokens belong to.

claimTokensFor(address,uint256,uint256,a.details: Only a project's controller can claim that project's tokens.

params.amount: The amount of tokens to claim.
params.beneficiary: The account into which the claimed tokens will go.
params.holder: The owner of the credits being redeemed.
params.projectId: The ID of the project whose tokens are being claimed.

params.directory: A contract storing directories of terminals and controllers for each project.
params.token: The implementation of the token contract that project can deploy.

deployERC20For(uint256,string,string,byt.details: Deploys a project's ERC-20 token contract.Only a project's controller can deploy its token.

params.name: The ERC-20's name.
params.projectId: The ID of the project to deploy an ERC-20 token for.
params.salt: The salt used for ERC-1167 clone deployment. Pass a non-zero salt for deterministic deployment based on `msg.sender` and the `TOKEN` implementation address.

returns.token: The address of the token that was deployed.

mintFor(address,uint256,uint256).details: Only a project's current controller can mint its tokens.

params.amount: The amount of tokens to mint.
params.holder: The address receiving the new tokens.
params.projectId: The ID of the project to which the tokens belong.

setTokenFor(uint256,address).details: Only a project's controller can set its token.

params.projectId: The ID of the project to set the token of.

params.holder: The holder to get a balance for.
params.projectId: The project to get the `_holder`s balance for.

returns.balance: The combined token and token credit balance of the `_holder

params.projectId: The ID of the project to get the total supply of.

returns.totalSupply: The total supply of the project's tokens and token credits.

transferCreditsFrom(address,uint256,addr.details: Only a project's controller can transfer credits for that project.

params.amount: The amount of credits to transfer.
params.holder: The address to transfer credits from.
params.projectId: The ID of the project whose credits are being transferred.

DIRECTORY().notice: The directory of terminals and controllers for projects.

claimTokensFor(address,uint256,uint256,a.notice: Redeem credits to claim tokens into a holder's wallet.

creditBalanceOf(address,uint256).notice: Each holder's credit balance for each project.

deployERC20For(uint256,string,string,byt.notice: Deploys an ERC-20 token for a project. It will be used when claiming tokens.

setTokenFor(uint256,address).notice: Set a project's token if not already set.

totalBalanceOf(address,uint256).notice: The total balance a holder has for a specified project, including both tokens and token credits.

totalCreditSupplyOf(uint256).notice: The total supply of credits for each project.

totalSupplyOf(uint256).notice: The total supply for a specific project, including both tokens and token credits.

transferCreditsFrom(address,uint256,addr.notice: Allows a holder to transfer credits to another account.
